name: Arnav Kumar - DevOps Engineer at Zeta | Working To Simplify Complex Software Setup and Deployment
body:
### Welcome To My Portfolio.
I am a Development Operations Engineer at Zeta. My job is to monitor, scale and add security to applications and combine the knowledge of a software developer + NetSec Engineer to ensure that the app gets deployed and functions smoothly.
I am also versed in developing applications especially in Java and Python and I have a keen interest in the field of Cyber Security research.

### Brainstorming and Writing Code To Make An App Better
I like to think and brainstorm about how to write code in an efficient manner. Deploying, scaling up and continuous integration(CI) of the application is also part of my work pipeline.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
